title: Federal government announces $30 million AI safety crackdown
description: A disturbing new threat is emerging from artificial intelligence technology.
content:
The federal government has announced a major crackdown on artificial intelligence, investing almost $30 million to establish a dedicated AI safety institute.
The new institute, set to open in 2026, forms part of a broader government effort to prevent... [3718 chars]

title: OpenAI takes stake in Thrive Holdings in latest enterprise AI push
description: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has taken a stake in Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services, the companies said...
content:
Dec 1 (Reuters) - ChatGPT-maker OpenAI has taken a stake in Thrive Holdings as part of a partnership to embed artificial intelligence into traditional industries such as accounting and IT services, the companies said on Monday.

content:
The federal government has been working on a national roadmap for the use of AI. Photo: Jono Searle/AAP PHOTOS

title: AI Data Center Firm Iren Seeks $2 Billion in Convertible Bonds
description: Iren Ltd., a data center firm focused on artificial intelligence and high-performance computing, is seeking to raise $2 billion across two convertible bond issues.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- Iren Ltd., a data center firm focused on artificial intelligence and high-performance computing, is seeking to raise $2 billion across two convertible bond issues.

title: AI's impact could worsen gaps between world's rich and poor, a UN report says
description: A new report by the United Nations Development Program is urging governments to focus more on how artificial intelligence technologies might affect people
content:
A new report by the United Nations Development Program is urging governments to focus more on how artificial intelligence technologies might affect people already disadvantaged in a data-driven world

title: AI may discriminate against you at work. Some states are making it illegal.
description: New regulations aim to prevent discrimination from artificial intelligence and automated systems as they relate to employment.
content:
Derek Mobley applied for at least 80 jobs over several years but was rejected every time.
A Black worker over the age of 40, he says he has anxiety and depression and knows the main reason he wasn’t hired: Employers used Workday software. The allegat... [7354 chars]

title: Japanese companies' pretax profits rise 19% in July-September
description: Pretax profits at Japanese companies in the July-September period rose 19.7 percent from a year earlier to 27.54 trillion yen, marking a fourth straight quarterly increase, driven by strong demand in the field of artificial intelligence, the Finance Ministry said Monday.
